articles.title: Chess grandmaster Hans Niemann denies using vibrating sex toy to cheat - BBC
articles.description: Hans Niemann was accused of cheating after he beat Norwegian grandmaster Magnus Carlsen last September.
articles.content:
An American grandmaster who was part of a row which rattled the world of chess has denied using a vibrating sex toy to cheat.
In September 2022 Hans Niemann sat down to play Norwegian grandmaster Ma… [+2167 chars]
